	charset="Windows-1252"

Razor Claw saw the opening and took advantage. He transformed to Wolverine =
and shot out the door in a blur.

Bullet saw the mutant comeing out and tri=
ed to get in the way. A terrible collision followed which left both bots sl=
ideing across the floor of the Black Fortress. Bullet forced himself to his=
 feet, his temper flared. The former Trainer transformed to bull mode, stom=
ped his hoof and readied himself to charge.

Standing opposite the bull the=
 Wolverine growled ready for a fight but the sound of a comm echoed through=
 both systems ending the confrontation.

"Remember my favor." Blazes voice =
called through the comm getting Bullets attention. "We're near the confrenc=
e rooms Silver Scout with me and we're getting ready for a suicide assault =
against where they're holding Foxfingers, you two interested?"

The silence=
 didn't last long as both the bull and the Wolverine agreed that a suicide =
mission sounded almost fun.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWO=
LF4 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, October 07, 2001 1:40 AM=

  Subject: others


  Blaze and Silver Scout continued wandering back towa=
rd Shivahs location when Silver Scout picked up a scent. "Foxfingers?" the =
scent was strong, like he was close. "Kit Kat and Drillbit were with him, h=
e's in trouble."

  The tigress travelling with the wolf transformed to get=
 a better whif of what the mutant was smelling. "He's caught, there's nothi=
ng we can do." she had given up hope of escape. By now her computer access =
was probably cut off.

  "We have to save him, I owe my creator that much."=
 the wolf started off in the direction but was quickly stopped.

  "Then fi=
ne, you won't die alone." Even without her computer access she could still =
help, if she couldn't hack the computer then she wasn't worth the function =
her motherboard was printed on. "I'll see what I can do." the tigress trans=
formed back to her bot mode. The virus was taking effect eact time she tran=
sformed back she could feel it impedeing her transformation. Quickly access=
ing a computer terminal she learned that Razor Claw and Ender were still tr=
apped. "Let's see if I can't cause a little confusion around here." soon af=
ter the door opened giveing the two bots an escape route.

        Yahoo! G=
roups Sponsor
